slide.title: New Tools
slide.subtitle: SOAP
slide.blurb: The %SOAP% extension is a fast and fairly complete interface for creating and working with SOAP web-services.
slide.example:
<?php
// instantiate SOAP client object
$client = new SoapObject( "http://example.com/soap_server.php",
                          "urn:Object");
echo $client->version(); // call version() method
?>

list.title: Capabilities
list.bullet: Smaller code base, easier to extend
Makes use of new OO support in PHP 5
